generated.html:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
	<meta charset="UTF-8">
	<title>basic</title>
	<style type="text/css">
		#canvas2{
			width:500px;
			height: 300px;
		}
	</style>
</head>
<body>
	<canvas class="canvas1" id="canvas1" width="500" height="300"></canvas>
	<canvas class="canvas2" id="canvas2" ></canvas>
	<canvas class="canvas2" id="canvas3" ></canvas>
	<script type="text/javascript">
		var canvas_1 = document.getElementById('canvas1'),
			canvas_2 = document.getElementById('canvas2'),
			canvas_3 = document.getElementById('canvas3');
			canvas_3.width = 500;
			canvas_3.height = 300;
		var context_1 = canvas_1.getContext('2d'),
			context_2 = canvas_2.getContext('2d'),
			context_3 = canvas_3.getContext('2d');
		context_1.font = "38pt Arial";
		context_1.fillStyle = "cornflowerblue";
		context_1.strokeStyle = 'blue';			
		context_1.fillText('Hello world',canvas_1.width/2-150,canvas_1.height/2 + 15);
		context_1.strokeText('Hello world',canvas_1.width/2-150,canvas_1.height/2 + 15);
		
		context_2.font = "38pt Arial";
		context_2.fillStyle = "cornflowerblue";
		context_2.strokeStyle = 'blue';			
		context_2.fillText('Hello world',canvas_2.width/2-150,canvas_2.height/2 + 15);
		context_2.strokeText('Hello world',canvas_2.width/2-150,canvas_2.height/2 + 15);

		context_3.font = "38pt Arial";
		context_3.fillStyle = "cornflowerblue";
		context_3.strokeStyle = 'blue';			
		context_3.fillText('Hello world',canvas_3.width/2-150,canvas_3.height/2 + 15);
		context_3.strokeText('Hello world',canvas_3.width/2-150,canvas_3.height/2 + 15);

		console.log("canvas1",canvas_1.getBoundingClientRect(),canvas_1.width,canvas_1.height)
		console.log("canvas2",canvas_2.getBoundingClientRect(),canvas_2.width,canvas_2.height)
		console.log("canvas3",canvas_3.getBoundingClientRect(),canvas_3.width,canvas_3.height)


	</script>
</body>
</html>
